inclusion.criterion: Intermediate or high risk patient for surgical aortic valve replacement (SAVR)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: STS/EuroSCORE II >4% or logistic EuroSCORE I >10%
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%. He underwent cardiac cath and right heart cath to evaluate pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
